job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
AI/ML Ops Engineer

TeleHealth Start Up aiming to revolutionise healthcare⚡

New York (WFH possible)

$145,000 - $180,000 + Equity + Benefits

 

A New York based HealthTech Analytics Company is looking to hire an AI/ML Ops Engineer. They have recently raised over $20million Series B Funding to assist their rapid growth across the states and potentially Europe as well! The AI/ML Ops Engineer will join a team of ML and NLP (Natural Language Processing) experts, and will work closely with the AI Scientist to leverage healthcare data, and be fundamental in building their automated quality assessment program.

The AI/ML Ops Engineer should have prior experience in the Healthtech Space or a keen interest and passion for working on lifechanging and meaningful projects.

  

Responsibilities

  • Build and deploy robust, industrial scale Machine Learning Pipelines for NLP (Natural Language Processing)
  • Collaborate with both Software Engineering teams and Data Science teams
  • Enhance and maintain pipelines for continuous integration
  • Contribute to the enhancement and extension of data analytics pipelines

 

Requirements

  • MS/PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related discipline
  • Expert proficiency Machine Learning Pipelines
  • Experience within Unix-based Environments 
  • Expert proficiency with Python, AWS and related libraries
  • Ideally experience with deep learning frameworks such as PyTorch and Tensorflow
  • Strong communication skills as you will be required to collaborate with teams across data, engineering
  • Experience or interest in the HealthTech. Experience working in a similar organization would be a big plus but not required
  • Bonus if you have experience with Kubernetes, Docker, or similar platforms

 

Benefits

  • Competitive Salary + Equity (negotiable and based on experience)
  • Robust healthcare plans and matching 401K
  • Flexible working hours and WFH
  • Stipend to spruce up your home office!
  • Great people to work with – an extremely Diverse team and a company that cares about Diversity, Equity & Inclusion
  • Lots of virtual events for you to connect with your team

 

The team has just started it’s search and with the fast growth plans is looking to secure a candidate as soon as possible.

 

🌎 The office is based in New York. Remote may be a possibility.

 

📧 Interested in applying? Please click on the ‘Easy Apply’ button

 

⚡ Storm3 is a HealthTech recruitment firm with clients across London, Europe and North America. To discuss open opportunities or career options, please visit our website www.storm3.com and follow the Storm3 Linked In page for the latest jobs and intel
